Oct 28 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:

  • HALF YEAR RESULTS

  • H1 REVENUE 2.272 BILLION USD

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - HY UNDERLYING EBITDA GREW BY 35.2% TO $1,098M IN REPORTED CURRENCY

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - BOARD HAS DECLARED AN INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 2 CENTS PER SHARE

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - HY CUSTOMER BASE GREW BY 5.4% TO 122.7 MILLION

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)
